SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

name.pehl.gwt.piriti.client.xml
Annotation Type XmlField

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface XmlField

Annotation for mapping XML data to POJO fields. The XML is selected by an xpath expression and converted if necessary to the type of the annotated field. For some types you can specify a format which is used when converting the XML data to the fields type.

Please note that the annotated fields must not be private!

The following types are supported:

Type Default xpath expression Format options
boolean, Boolean <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
byte, Byte <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
char, Character <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
java.util.Date <fieldname>/text() If no format is specified a default format is used. Otherwise must be a valid date format as described by DateTimeFormat
double, Double <fieldname>/text() If no format is specified the XML data is converted using Double.parseDouble(String). Otherwise must be a valid number format as described by NumberFormat
float, Float <fieldname>/text() If no format is specified the XML data is converted using Float.parseFloat(String). Otherwise must be a valid number format as described by NumberFormat
int, Integer <fieldname>/text() If no format is specified the XML data is converted using Integer.parseInt(String). Otherwise must be a valid number format as described by NumberFormat
long, Long <fieldname>/text() If no format is specified the XML data is converted using Long.parseLong(String). Otherwise must be a valid number format as described by NumberFormat
short, Short <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
String <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
Enums <fieldname>/text() No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
All types for which a XmlReader is registered <fieldname> No format supported. If specified it is ignored.
Arrays of the above types <fieldname> If a format is specified it is applied for all array elements.
Typed collections of the above types <fieldname> If a format is specified it is applied for all collection elements.

Supported collections:

  • Collection
  • List
  • ArrayList
  • LinkedList
  • Set
  • HashSet
  • SortedSet
  • TreeSet

Please note that all collections must have type parameters, otherwise they cannot be mapped.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 75 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $

Optional Element Summary
 String format
          The format to use when converting the XML data to the fields type.
 String value
          An xpath expression to select the XML data.
 

value

public abstract String value
An xpath expression to select the XML data. Defaults to "" which means that the fields name is taken as a base for the xpath expression.

Returns:
Default:
""

format

public abstract String format
The format to use when converting the XML data to the fields type. Defaults to "".

Returns:
Default:
""
